author: mariohavel
content:
Are you interested in contributing Ethereum clients, testing, research or other core infrastructure? A great opportunity opens right now, Ethereum Protocol Fellowship cohort 4 is here! Applications are opened till June 16. https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/06/01/ethereum-protocol-fellowship-fourth-apps-open
If you want to dive into the core protocol and improve your technical skills, don't hesitate to send an application. If you are not sure and need to learn about the previous cohort, projects there and structure of the fellowship, check the recap blog https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/05/10/ethereum-protocol-fellowship-third-recap
You can also ask questions or check the previous activity in <#843176491386667018> channel here.
